sentences.english: This is the time to say that all our thoughts and prayers are with his family.

sentences.english: And in this national cemetery , it is another day when grief remains fresh.

sentences.english: Wait until you re home to offer condolences.

sentences.english: And mourners gathered to pay farewell to Ezer Weizman, Israel's former president and a peace pioneer who died over the weekend.

sentences.english: Away from family and brothers, the initial weeks time is very grief.
